titles: A proclamation for the more effectual in-bringing of the hearth-money.
author: Scotland. Privy Council.
Scotland. Sovereign (1689-1694 : William and Mary)
publisher: Printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson, Printer to their most excellent Majesties,
notes: Royal arms at head of text; initial letter.
Dated: Given under Our Signet at Edinburgh, the twentie day of April, and of Our Reign the third year, 1691.
Signed: Gilb. Eliot, Cls. Secreti Concilij.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
